channel.title: american on Michael's Recipe Collection
channel.description: Recent content in american on Michael's Recipe Collection

item.title: Baked Oats
item.description: Choose between using banana or canned pumpkin, and use only one of chocolate chips or pecans

item.title: Pumpkin Chili
item.description: Adding canned pumpkin to the chili gives it a thick sauce without needing to simmer for very long and adds a lot of extra nutrition without changing the flavor very much.
